title: Week 3 position-by-position expert fantasy rankings: A matchup for the ages is on tap
text:
Week 3 features a quarterback matchup for the ages. (Photos by Todd Olszewski/Sam Greenwood/Getty Images)

Patrick Mahomes and Lamar Jackson are currently two of the top-scoring quarterbacks in Yahoo Fantasy, with Jackson holding a slim lead at the top spot. And this week, we’ll have the luxury of seeing the two young phenoms go off against each other as the Ravens travel to Kansas City for an AFC matchup.

Check out how our experts’ have them ranked, along with every other position for Week 3:

2019 Fantasy Football Rankings powered by FantasyPros ECR ™ - Expert Consensus Rankings
description: Our experts reveal their fantasy football rankings for every position in time for Week 3 of the 2019 NFL season, when two of the top-scoring QBs, Patrick Mahomes and Lamar Jackson, will face off.
